title: Double wall coffee cups
subTitle: the alliance between style and practical

marketingArguments.title: Double-wall feature keeps your hot drinks warm
Designed to be effective
marketingArguments.speech: Under the glass floor is a hydrophobic silicone membrane, which serves to equalize the pressure between the glass walls. It leaves the glass 'breathe': with cold drinks, no condensation forms on the glass surface and the glass does not leave any unsightly water rims.

marketingArguments.title: No more burning hands
marketingArguments.speech: The outside walls stay cool to the touch even when filled with hot drinks
